<html><div style='background-color:#ff0000'><P>Yan:</P>
<P> I have one thing to say to you. Actually, several. One, Megan and I both came up with that idea, so you have no reason to pull that S@#$ on me. Two, just because you don't like me and are jealous of Megan and I's friendship, you have no right to take it out on me in public form and if you were such a good person, you wouldn't let your personal emotions over-ride your brain and do something stupid like this. I've read some of the stuff you've said and they're just as  "sick and twisted" as mine, hell, they've been worse. If you have a problem with my spending time with megan or with the way I write my posts, then take it up with me and private and not in public. Do you understand? I am VERY angry with the way you handled this situation and I wouldn't be suprised if Megan was too! We work on my posts together as to not offend you, you have no right doing this to me!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!</P></div><br clear=all><hr>Get Your Private, Free E-mail from MSN Hotmail at <a href="http://www.hotmail.com">http://www.hotmail.com</a>.<br></p></html>
